00019 ///////////////////
00020 // If you want to use the adress of some Uint32 directly with memcpy or similar, use this
00021 inline Uint32 SDLColourToNativeColour(Uint32 pixel, short bpp) {
00022 #if SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN
00023  return (pixel << (32 - 8 * bpp));
00024 #else
00025  return pixel;
00026 #endif
00027 }
00028 
00029 /////////////////
00030 // If you copied some data directly with memcpy into an Uint32, use this
00031 inline Uint32 NativeColourToSDLColour(Uint32 pixel, short bpp) {
00032 #if SDL_BYTEORDER == SDL_BIG_ENDIAN
00033  return (pixel >> (32 - 8 * bpp));
00034 #else
00035  return pixel;
00036 #endif
00037 }

00041 ///////////////
00042 // Get the specified component from the pixel (grabbed from SDL)
00043 inline Uint8 GetR(Uint32 pixel, SDL_PixelFormat *fmt)  {
00044  return  (Uint8)((((pixel & fmt->Rmask) >> fmt->Rshift) << fmt->Rloss) +
00045      (((pixel & fmt->Rmask) >> fmt->Rshift) >> (8 - (fmt->Rloss << 1))));
00046 }
00047 
00048 inline Uint8 GetG(Uint32 pixel, SDL_PixelFormat *fmt)  {
00049  return  (Uint8)((((pixel & fmt->Gmask) >> fmt->Gshift) << fmt->Gloss) +
00050      (((pixel & fmt->Gmask) >> fmt->Gshift) >> (8 - (fmt->Gloss << 1))));
00051 }
00052 
00053 inline Uint8 GetB(Uint32 pixel, SDL_PixelFormat *fmt)  {
00054  return  (Uint8)((((pixel & fmt->Bmask) >> fmt->Bshift) << fmt->Bloss) +
00055      (((pixel & fmt->Bmask) >> fmt->Bshift) >> (8 - (fmt->Bloss << 1))));
00056 }
00057 
00058 inline Uint8 GetA(Uint32 pixel, SDL_PixelFormat *fmt)  {
00059  return  (Uint8)((((pixel & fmt->Amask) >> fmt->Ashift) << fmt->Aloss) +
00060      (((pixel & fmt->Amask) >> fmt->Ashift) >> (8 - (fmt->Aloss << 1))));
00061 }
00062 
00063 extern SDL_PixelFormat* mainPixelFormat;
00064 
00065 inline SDL_PixelFormat* getMainPixelFormat() {
00066  return mainPixelFormat;
00067 }
00068 
00069 ///////////////
00070 // Returns true if the two colors are the same, ignoring the alpha
00071 // HINT: both colors have to be in the same pixelformat
00072 inline bool EqualRGB(Uint32 p1, Uint32 p2, SDL_PixelFormat* fmt) {
00073  return ((p1|fmt->Amask) == (p2|fmt->Amask));
00074 }
00075 
00076 ///////////////
00077 // Creates a int colour based on the 3 components
00078 // HINT: format is that one from videosurface!
00079 inline Uint32 MakeColour(Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b) {
00080  return SDL_MapRGB(getMainPixelFormat(), r, g, b);
00081 }
00082 
00083 ///////////////
00084 // Creates a int colour based on the 4 components
00085 // HINT: format is that one from videosurface!
00086 inline Uint32 MakeColour(Uint8 r, Uint8 g, Uint8 b, Uint8 a) {
00087  return SDL_MapRGBA(getMainPixelFormat(), r, g, b, a);
00088 }
00089 
00090 // Device-independent color
00091 struct Color {
00092  Color() : r(0), g(0), b(0), a(SDL_ALPHA_OPAQUE) {}
00093  Color(Uint8 _r, Uint8 _g, Uint8 _b) : r(_r), g(_g), b(_b), a(SDL_ALPHA_OPAQUE) {}
00094  Color(Uint8 _r, Uint8 _g, Uint8 _b, Uint8 _a) : r(_r), g(_g), b(_b), a(_a) {}
00095  Color(SDL_PixelFormat *f, Uint32 cl) { SDL_GetRGBA(cl, f, &r, &g, &b, &a); }
00096  explicit Color(Uint32 cl) { set(getMainPixelFormat(), cl); }
00097  Color(const SDL_Color& cl) : r(cl.r), g(cl.g), b(cl.b), a(SDL_ALPHA_OPAQUE) {}
00098 
00099  Uint8 r;
00100  Uint8 g;
00101  Uint8 b;
00102  Uint8 a;
00103 
00104  Uint32 get() const { return get(getMainPixelFormat()); }
00105  Uint32 get(SDL_PixelFormat *f) const { return SDL_MapRGBA(f, r, g, b, a); }
00106  Uint32 getDefault() const { return (Uint32(r) << 24) | (Uint32(g) << 16) | (Uint32(b) << 8) | Uint32(a); }
00107  Color derived(Sint16 _r, Sint16 _g, Sint16 _b, Sint16 _a) const {
00108   return Color(
00109       Uint8(CLAMP(_r + r, 0, 255)),
00110       Uint8(CLAMP(_g + g, 0, 255)),
00111       Uint8(CLAMP(_b + b, 0, 255)),
00112       Uint8(CLAMP(_a + a, 0, 255)));
00113  }
00114  void set(SDL_PixelFormat *f, Uint32 cl) { SDL_GetRGBA(cl, f, &r, &g, &b, &a); }
00115 
00116  bool operator == ( const Color & c ) const { return r == c.r && g == c.g && b == c.b && a == c.a; };
00117  bool operator != ( const Color & c ) const { return ! ( *this == c ); };
00118 
00119  Color operator * ( float f ) const { return Color( Uint8(CLAMP(r*f,0.0f,255.0f)), Uint8(CLAMP(g*f,0.0f,255.0f)), Uint8(CLAMP(b*f,0.0f,255.0f)), a ); };
00120  Color operator + ( const Color & c ) const { return Color( (Uint8)CLAMP(Uint16(r)+c.r,0,255), (Uint8)CLAMP(Uint16(g)+c.g,0,255), (Uint8)CLAMP(Uint16(b)+c.b,0,255), (Uint8)(Uint16(a)+c.a)/2 ); };
00121  bool operator<(const Color& c) const {
00122   if(r != c.r) return r < c.r;
00123   if(g != c.g) return g < c.g;
00124   if(b != c.b) return b < c.b;
00125   return a < c.a;
00126  }
00127  Uint8& operator[](int i) { switch(i) { case 0: return r; case 1: return g; case 2: return b; case 3: return a; default: assert(false); } return *((Uint8*)NULL); }
00128  Uint8 operator[](int i) const { switch(i) { case 0: return r; case 1: return g; case 2: return b; case 3: return a; default: assert(false); } return 0; }
00129 };
00130 
00131 #endif
